siteMetadata.title: Sonia Lahcene - Global Digital Design Lead - London
siteMetadata.description: Passionate Global Digital Design Lead and Design Manager with years of experience in eCommerce, digital strategy and web design. Very organised and self-motivated, I love the challenge of developing best-in-class designs to create outstanding brand and customer experiences on all digital touchpoints.
siteMetadata.author: Sonia Lahcene
